name: Multi Spells
description:
Awoken in a small chamber inside a dungeon, a rock-like figure merges into life. Flowing with magical energy, and guided by a pixie, they insist on getting out of the dungeon in one piece. But monsters dwell inside the dungeon, waiting to crumble them apart. Assisted by the power of spell cards, are they able to escape the dungeon or will they suffer eternally inside it...? 

Controls:
- A,D to move sideways
- S to go down of platform
- SHIFT to dash
- Mouse to aim
- Left click to melee
- I or TAB to open and close inventory
- 1,2,3 to select spell cards from the deck
- Q to change deck
- Right click to use spell cards
- E to heal
- F to interact
- ESC to go to menu
